title: Authors and Citation
text: Edgar Treischl. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Treischl E (2024). gist: Manage GitHub Gist. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gist: Manage GitHub Gist},   author = {Edgar Treischl},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html}, }

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: gist package provides set functions work GitHub Gist. allows copy, create, delete gists via GitHub API. Moreover, comes R Studio addin - shiny app - manage Gists.

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: can install development version gist like : order connect Git Hub API, need provide GitHub API token (names : github_api) keyring package. Use key_set() function store token safely:
code: devtools::install_github("edgar-treischl/gist") #Save GitHub API token as github_api keyring::key_set(service = "github_api")

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: need learn package works, comes R Studio addin let manage Gists. Go addin menu use following code open gist app. app shows list gist files preview code. Pick gist copy insert code. Furthermore, app tabs create delete gists well.  want interact via R, can use following functions. Create new Gist via: Get gist via: Set raw parameter TRUE case need raw character vector. Finally, let us delete gist. Therefore, need inspect gists get know id gist. delete gist, give id gist_delete() function.
code: #The gistAddin() library(gist) gist::gistAddin() #Create a gist gist_create(name = "A_Test.R",              code = '#Test             print("Hello world")',              description = "Test Gist") #> ✔ Insert A_Test.R #> [1] "TRUE" #gistfiles lists all files and returns names and ids gist_get(filename = "A_Test.R")  #> ✔ Copied A_Test.R from your GitHub account. #gistFiles lists all files and returns names and ids mygists <- gist::gistFiles() mygists |> head() #>                  file                               id #> 1            A_Test.R 92fa4eeda00996058731e056c31e4535 #> 2        attachment.R 0daa7241e752a4c4f77ad0085b9d7694 #> 3             clear.R 27a596e3c9cf3b533936e771a01d840f #> 4 cli_progress_step.R c0a0c0485afd7b0b48101e86a5dd1b3c #> 5    dbi::dbConnect.R 330939119e04086d3a68a3c7662ad5a0 #> 6        dotwhisker.R 725f9b302453c9456e6dcc546760a0d4 #Delete a gist gist::gist_delete(id = mygists$id[1]) #> ✔ Deleted id: 92fa4eeda00996058731e056c31e4535 #> [1] "TRUE"

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: function create_gist() creates new Gist file.

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: name name file. code code character. description description code character.

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: Message successful.

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: careful: function delete_gist() deletes Gist file.

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: id id Gist file (gistfiles).

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: Message file successfully deleted.

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: function get_gist() copies Gist file.

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: filename file name gist file. description TRUE, function returns description Gist.

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: Message successful.

title: The Gist Addin — gistAddin
text: gistAddin() creates shiny app manage gists. Pick gist, press copy insert button code insert. Furthermore can create delete gists well.

what: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
text: gist_addin() creates shiny miniui app manage gists. Pick gist, press copy insert button code insert current document Furthermore can create delete gists well.

title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
Create a Gist — gist_create
text: function gist_create() creates new Gist file.

text: name name file. code code character. description description code character.

title: Create a Gist — gist_create
text: Message successful.

title: Delete a Gist — gist_delete
text: careful: function gist_delete() deletes Gist file.

title: Delete a Gist — gist_delete
text: id id Gist file (gistFiles).

title: Delete a Gist — gist_delete
text: Message file successfully deleted.

title: Get a Gist — gist_get
text: function gist_get() copies Gist Git Hub.

title: Get a Gist — gist_get
text: filename file name gist file. description TRUE, function returns description Gist. raw Get raw text string copy clipboard.

title: Get a Gist — gist_get
text: Message successful.

title: List All Gist Files — gistFiles
text: function gistFiles() returns Gist files given Git Hub account.

title: List All Gist Files — gistFiles
text: arrange arrange files alphabetically, set TRUE.

title: List All Gist Files — gistFiles
text: Data frame file names id.
